text: Vincent Candela (born 24 October 1973) is a former French football player. He has played for France national team. ==Career statistics== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Continental Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Toulouse 1992–93 Division 1 3 0 – – 3 0 1993–94 27 1 1 0 – 28 1 1994–95 Division 2 27 2 – – 27 2 Total 57 3 1 0 0 0 58 3 Guingamp 1995–96 Division 1 27 1 4 0 – 31 1 1996–97 21 1 2 0 3 0 26 1 Total 48 2 6 0 3 0 57 2 Roma 1996–97 Serie A 15 2 – – 15 2 1997–98 32 2 6 0 – 38 2 1998–99 30 1 4 0 8 0 42 1 1999–00 26 3 4 1 8 0 38 4 2000–01 33 3 2 0 5 0 40 3 2001–02 31 2 2 1 10 0 43 3 2002–03 23 1 8 0 10 0 41 1 2003–04 12 0 4 0 4 0 20 0 2004–05 8 0 1 0 3 0 12 0 Total 210 14 31 2 48 0 289 16 Bolton 2004–05 Premier League 9 0 2 0 – 11 0 Udinese 2005–06 Serie A 26 1 3 0 11 1 40 2 Siena 2006–07 Serie A 14 0 2 0 – 16 0 Messina (loan) 2006–07 Serie A 16 0 – – 16 0 Career total 380 20 45 2 62 1 487 23 ===International goals=== :Scores and results list France's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Candela goal.
